name: That was just an accident!
description:
Your next task as a serial killer is simple - kill a mafia boss in public restaurant. But there is a little catch... it must look as if it is caused by accident!

Use environment and find multiple ways to accomplish your goal!

Controls:

- WSAD - character movement

- Q/E - camera movement

- Spacebar - interaction

Team:

Kamil Maślanka - Programmer & Developer

Łukasz Zieniewicz - Programmer

Łukasz Rdzanek - Level Design & Level Art

Sebastian Kowalik - 3D Graphics

Piotrek Ruszkowski - SFX & Music

Tomek Depczyński - Game Design & Music
